hero.title: Diego Moreno
hero.subtitle: Frontend Developer
hero.description: Creating elegant and functional digital experiences

about.title: About Me
about.description: Learn more about me, my experience, and my passion for web development.
about.parrafo1: I am a web developer with over 5 years of experience in developing web applications and sites using technologies such as Drupal, Angular, React, and .NET.
about.parrafo2: My approach is to create digital solutions that not only meet technical requirements but also provide an excellent user experience. I specialize in both frontend and backend development, with a strong emphasis on creating clean and functional interfaces.
about.parrafo3: Throughout my career, I have worked with various companies and organizations, from startups to large corporations, helping them bring their ideas to life and improve their digital presence.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: These are some of the most notable projects I've worked on. Each represents different challenges and technical solutions I've implemented.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Interested in working together or want to know more about my projects? Send me a message and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
